CONFIRMATIONMERCI: Thank you for announcing your trip with your bike
CONFIRMATIONP1: Just give us a moment to check that there will be enough places available to transport your bike! Or, for example, to organize a trailer if that is possible on certain lines.
CONFIRMATIONP2: An email will be sent to you by the operations manager of the region or line on which you will be travelling. This as soon as he has been able to make sure that the transport of your bike can be done without worries.
ERREURPLUSIEURSZONES: It is not possible to book in several areas
